name: Tomato Paste

benefits.title: Antioxidant
benefits.description: Rich in lycopene, an antioxidant linked to heart and some cancer benefits.

benefits.title: Vitamins
benefits.description: Concentrated source of vitamins A, C, and K.

benefits.title: Flavor
benefits.description: Boosts flavor and color in dishes without extra calories or fat.

description: Tomato paste is the burst of summer in a jar! Crafted from ripe tomatoes, it's a versatile flavor enhancer with a concentrated tanginess that elevates any dish. Picture the vibrant essence of sun-ripened tomatoes with a touch of sweetness, all in a convenient, kitchen-friendly paste. Rich in lycopene and nutrients, it's a wholesome addition to your culinary repertoire.
